member.name: M:Crm.Controllers.Crmdata.ContratsController.OnContratsRead(System.Linq.IQueryable{Crm.Models.Crmdata.Contrat}@)
member.summary: It filters the opportunities by the current user's id.
member.param: The queryable object that you want to filter.

member.name: M:Crm.Controllers.Crmdata.ContratsController.OnContratCreated(Crm.Models.Crmdata.Contrat)
member.summary: It sets the UserId property of the opportunity to the current user's id.
member.param: The opportunity that is being created.
